revised_title: The Origin and History of the Meteoric Iron in the British Museum
tldr: The author investigates the origin and history of the meteoric iron in the British Museum, tracing its connection to the Otumpa Iron described by Rubin de Celis in 1786. The iron was used to create pistols, which were then sent as a gift to the President of the United States. The author also discusses the political context surrounding its acquisition and transportation.
